Dart.org - Public Transit Bus System. Three relatively new Green line stations have opened up, with one right in Old Town (downtown). North Carrollton is the terminal ending for the green line heading north.

value: content=A very neat place to visit
directions=NW corner of Rosemeade Pkwy and Marsh Ln. DART Bus #341.

content=A traditional Russian banya (sauna).  This is basically the only one of its kind in area.  The sauna provides a consistent "wet heat".  Along with the sauna there is a traditional Finnish sauna for a "dry heat", a Turkish steam room, an authentic Russian restaurant, venik massages, an ice-cold plunge pool, and cleansing showers for a complete relaxation experience.
directions=On Broadway St. between Main St and 4th Ave. DART Bus #400

content=A small diner located in Old Downtown Carrollton.  They have a wide variety of burgers and sandwiches, coupled with a lot of deep-fried finger foods.  Shakes, ice-cream floats, ice cream sodas, pies, and cookies for dessert.  The restaurant has a wacky rainbow theme.
content=There is a complimentary shuttle from this Embassy Suites Hotel to destinations three miles around, including the Dallas Market Center and downtown Dallas.

Take I-35 north about 20 miles to

, which is home to both the University of North Texas and Texas Women's University. There is a lively music scene, centered around the old courthouse square downtown, which is surrounded by restaurants, some bars, and several shops. Easy parking.
